description.gold-silver:
Cuts the PP of the
foe's last move.
description.crystal:
Cuts the PP of the
foe's last move.
description.ruby-sapphire:
Spitefully cuts the PP
of the foe’s last move.
description.emerald:
Spitefully cuts the PP
of the foe’s last move.
description.firered-leafgreen:
A move that cuts
2 to 5 PP from the
move last used by
the foe.
description.diamond-pearl:
The user looses its
grudge on the move
last used by the foe
by cutting 4 PP from
it.
description.platinum:
The user looses its
grudge on the move
last used by the foe
by cutting 4 PP from
it.
description.heartgold-soulsilver:
The user looses its
grudge on the move
last used by the foe
by cutting 4 PP from
it.
description.black-white:
The user unleashes its grudge on the move
last used by the target by cutting 4 PP
from it.
description.black-2-white-2:
The user unleashes its grudge on the move
last used by the target by cutting 4 PP
from it.
description.x-y:
The user unleashes its grudge on the move
last used by the target by cutting 4 PP
from it.
description.omega-ruby-alpha-sapphire:
The user unleashes its grudge on the move
last used by the target by cutting 4 PP
from it.
description.sun-moon:
The user unleashes its grudge on the move last used
by the target by cutting 4 PP from it.
description.ultra-sun-ultra-moon:
The user unleashes its grudge on the move last used

description.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee:
The user unleashes its grudge on the move last used

description.sword-shield:
The user unleashes its grudge on the move last used
by the target by cutting 4 PP from it.

effect.full: Lowers the PP of the target's last used move by 4.  If the target hasn't used a move since entering the field, if it tried to use a move this turn and failed, or if its last used move has 0 PP remaining, this move will fail.
effect.shortEffect: Lowers the PP of the target's last used move by 4.
